text: The Women University Multan (WUM), , is a public university located in Multan, Punjab, Pakistan. It was established on the initiative of Chief Minister Punjab Muhammad Shahbaz Sharif. The university became operational in 2013 when VC was appointed. ==Programs== Women University Multan offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs in following discipline *English *Mathematics *Urdu *Islamiyat *Chemistry *Physics *Economics *Business Administration *Psychology *Sociology *Statistics *Computer Science *Information Technology (and many more) ==See also== * University of Sahiwal * Government College Women University, Faisalabad * Government College Women University, Sialkot * University of Okara * Government Sadiq College Women University, Bahawalpur ==References== ==External links== * Category:Educational institutions established in 2013 Category:Women's universities and colleges in Pakistan Category:2013 establishments in Pakistan Category:Public universities and colleges in Punjab, Pakistan Category:Universities and colleges in Multan
title: Women University Multan
